Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

XMIDI Callback Prefix (108)

Discussion

This controller specifies that the next Control Change message encountered in this channel should obtain its value from the return value of an application callback function. For more information on the Callback Prefix controller, see the AIL_register_prefix_callback function description.

Next Topic (XMIDI Sequence Branch (109))

Previous Topic (XMIDI Channel Mute (107))


Group: Extended MIDI Technical Reference
Related Functions: AIL_register_prefix_callback
